Posts.Content:
Bev, good to "see" you. Been a few years. Sorry to hear about
 your DH. Hope he does better each day. 
I am fine....NED for 11+years. Fibromyalgia does its everlasting best to run my life. But am actually doing better than have done since dx. For that I am grateful. I credit that to neurofeedback, which retaught my brain how to relax. 
We have 5 grandchildren, youngest of 3.5 months old. So fun to have baby around again. We go to Yuma Az every winter...love that heat in Jan through March. We stay same place every year and in our motorhome. Have made lots of new relationships. When I get a chance, I will look through archives and see who all is around. Saw Gail(postal2)...but we've not met.
Love and hugs to all Marge
Posts.Title: Happy hello...been a long time.

Posts.Content:
MK, I am SO sorry for all the losses and hurt you have had to endure in last few years. Carolyn sounds like such a fighter. Your belated service for Chuck sounds beautiful. What a wonderful way to celebrate his life. We should all be so lucky. I, too, remember Cherilynn and all their trips. Her husband gave me a bad time in St. Louis because the NE cornhuskers got whipped by Oklahoma the Sat. we were there. I keep a group picture from St Louis on my craft desk. Like Bev said, too many from that group are gone. And I doubt that I know how many. Sometimes I feel guilty because I'm still NED. 
I had forgotten about
 all the health problems Bev's husband has.
Hugs and smiles to you, MK
Marge
Posts.Title: MK.....OMG

Posts.Content: I had too many problems with Tamofixin so switched to femara(that was when it was fairly new and given to met. disease only). I got along much better with femara. And, 10 years later I'm still NED
Posts.Title: Femara - anyone on it? Been on it?
pork chop bone remains the diagnosis...

Posts.Content: I just read recent roll call and it certainly made my heart smile. I am Marge from Nebraska. I think of you women so often. I still have a picture from St. Louis on my desk.
Posts.Title: I can't believe I found you iVillage girls!!!

Posts.Content: Marge, Nebraska for all of my 62 years! 11 years and 9 months NED. Had ductal invasive cancer with 1 node (which was perinodal). Bil mast., no reconstruction (keep my GIRLS on back of toilet at night). did chemo, radiation and tamofixin and femara.
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
